Malawi gay couple to be sentenced next month | News Story on 365gay.com
 
 By Ruth Schneider, 365gay.com
 02.22.2010 4:02pm EST
 
 The Malawi couple who took part in an unofficial wedding will be sentenced next month. The couple, Tiwonge Chimbalanga and Steven Monjeza, is charged with gross indecency.
 
 “The court will meet on March 22 for judgment,” magistrate Nyakwawa Usiwausiwa said after a hearing, according to a report from AFP.
 
 
 
 The couple faces up to 14 years in prison.
 
 More than 30 nations on the African continent ban gay sex. Same-sex marriage is only legal in South Africa.
